page.title: 15SCOUTS & GUIDES IN TICKHILL
page.content: Tickhill{scouts}is divided into 2 groups Lancaster and York but they are both in the same district and troop (13th Doncaster Tickhill).The scout uniform consists of green beret,shirt, beige trousers and a yellow and royal blue necker (which is like a cravat) Each week the groups meet and organize activies like games and physical programmes. Tickhill's{Guides}meet once a week on a Tuesday night.The Guide uniform consists of a blue blouse,blue skirt, belt,hat,and a coloured tie.Once a year they have a cookout which they go outside and cook there own food.Also they have nature trails where they follow a trail round the countryside. In summer they go to camp and sleep in tents.On the 22nd Febuary the guides have a Thinking day,when they have a service and think about other guides.
